thread.title: AB
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by AB

author: AB
title: AB
text: I received a very nice and clean car from RedSpot. The car was almost new doing only about 5000 on the odometer. The represetative was also willing to cater for my specific need.. Only let down was taking an additional $1000 security deposit which I'm still waiting for a refund after almost a month of the rental took place.
